Keywords: Armor , Future , Jean Grey School For Higher Learning , Mystical , Ruler , X-Men
Real Name: Piotr Rasputin
Special Powers
ROLE TAG: Captain
JEAN GREY SCHOOL OF THE FUTURE: At the beginning of the game, choose another friendly character with the Jean Grey School for Higher Learning keyword. The chosen character is considered a Sidekick this game.
LET US BEGIN: FREE: Choose a friendly Sidekick. The chosen Sidekick has Mystics team ability until your next turn.
WHOEVER HOLDS THE SOULSWORD IS THE RULER OF LIMBO: Passenger: 2, Phasing/Teleport. // When Colossus is given a MOVE action, after resolutions he can make a close attack -or- use the X-Men team ability as FREE.

December 24, 2021
FlashSpidey
This piece looks really fun. Plus there are so many goofy team builds he allows for due to making someone a sidekick. There are a bunch of sidekick effects that are neat but the issue has always been the sidekicks just aren't that good, as they are such low cost figures. Now your captains can buff a good piece. It will be costly so maybe not that good but definitely fun. I mean, consider the possibilities with an already great piece like xmrf Kid Gladiator. Gotta mess around with this.

Goop
He seems pretty good, decent top values that dont fall too much. Opening prob with some solid move and attack while carrying. He's nothing amazing but he's good for his points. There are probably some neat tricks you can do giving certain figures Mystics.
